t:
“Daddy, will you show me how Mommy does it?”



“Why not, sweetheart?
To start, take your pants off first.”
c:
“Good job. Now go with this nice man to Mommy and Daddy's room.” I looked at the man, his sinister grin made me uncomfortable, but I trust Daddy.
